name: ~ Retro Turtle ~
description: Do you like 16x16 games?  Do you like shooters?  More specific, do you like top-down shooters?  Then this game is probably for you!  Play as a turtle with guns, and you shoot things.  You have a few guns with gimmicks, pistol, machine gun, mini-gun, shurikens, and the Daedalus gun-bow!  Boxes can be found around the map occasionally, fire, lightning, and holy boxes for you to pick up!  Upon pickup, these boxes will give you a special attack for a short bit!  The enemies are all different, the normal mob, the fast mob, the bloated mob, and the arachnid mob!  So why not try out this game, eh?  It's my first real game, meaning it's my first game made on Itch.io.  I would love feedback :)
